name: 弗洛里安·波赫拉特科
awards: 2025年 第75届柏林国际电影节 视点单元 最佳影片 (提名) 如何正常和另一个世界的怪异
name_full: 弗洛里安·波赫拉特科 Florian Pochlatko

last_movies.title: 如何正常和另一个世界的怪异

introduction: The Austrian writer, director and editor first studied experimental media art and then directing under Michael Haneke at the Film Academy Vienna, before completing his education with a master’s degree in critical studies under Diedrich Diederichsen at the Academy of Fine Arts in the same city. His short film Strawberry Fields won several awards. After working as a visual identity designer for musicians and as a curator in a number of cultural institutions, he is now returning to his roots with his debut feature film.
